sentences.english: Millions of people travel each year to experience nature’s splendour.
sentences.chinese: 每年有千百万人为领略壮丽的自然风光而旅游。

sentences.english: The hotel assimilates with the natural habitat of the island.
sentences.chinese: 宾馆吸收了海岛独特的自然风光特征。

sentences.english: The motorist enjoys an unobstructed view of the natural scenery as he drives across the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 躲开交通堵塞，去看看乡村的自然风光，真太惬意了。

sentences.english: This city is also famous for its beauty of the surrounding wild nature.
sentences.chinese: 这个城镇的自然风光也很美丽。

sentences.english: A style of art dealing with the depiction of natural scenery.
sentences.chinese: 一种描绘自然风光的绘画艺术流派。

sentences.english: Shenzhen is characteristic of localization, nature and culture.
sentences.chinese: 深圳富本土风情，自然风光与人文荟萃一处。

sentences.english: The mountain lake scenic area, surface mount ring water embrace, natural scenery advantageous.
sentences.chinese: 风景区依山面湖，山环水抱，自然风光得天独厚。

sentences.english: Was already impressed by the perfect environment and natural beauty of Yalong Bay.
sentences.chinese: 已经下了深刻的印象完善环境和自然风光的亚龙湾。

sentences.english: Trends Journey-Back to the Ancient Path of Tea and Horse.
sentences.chinese: 道，关注这条古老文明之路上的自然风光和人文风情。

sentences.english: For travelling visitors, they encounter a spirit of unashamed conviviality which is at the root of this city's addictive nature.
sentences.chinese: 游客们最为看重的是一个城市是否有绮丽的自然风光。

sentences.english: They took many photographs of the natural sights.
sentences.chinese: 他们拍了许多自然风光的照片。

definition: scenic lakes and mountain (idiom); beautiful lake and mountain landscape
lit. verdant hills and limpid water (idiom)/fig. enchanting scenery
